meanings.definition: An area of something, typically land or sea, presenting a wide continuous surface.
meanings.sent1: The vast expanses of the ocean stretched out before us.
meanings.sent2: She gazed at the endless expanses of green fields.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to conquer the expanse of the living room.
meanings.sent4: His mind wandered through the expansive expanses of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The painter captured the beauty of the colorful expanses on canvas.

meanings.definition: A wide extent or reach of something.
meanings.sent1: The vast expanses of the desert seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent2: The expanses of knowledge available on the internet are endless.
meanings.sent3: The cake covered an expanse of the table, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him knew no bounds, reaching across the expanses of time.
meanings.sent5: The explorer marveled at the untouched expanses of the Arctic.
